properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 5:24PM CST until January 16 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.
Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.
Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene...Hale...
Marengo...Pickens and Sumter Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of over the Tombigbee River drainage basin has led
to significant rises on the river, and a flood warning is now in
effect for much of the Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* from late Sunday night to Thursday afternoon...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At  5:00 PM Saturday The stage Was 89.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 101.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Monday morning and
continue to rise to near 103.6 feet by early Tuesday afternoon. The
river will fall below flood stage by early Thursday morning.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
